00045 #include <avr32/io.h>
00046 #include "compiler.h"
00047 #include "tc.h"
00048 
00049 
00050 int tc_get_interrupt_settings(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00051 {
00052   // Check for valid input.
00053   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00054     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00055 
00056   return tc->channel[channel].imr;
00057 }
00058 
00059 
00060 int tc_configure_interrupts(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel, const tc_interrupt_t *bitfield)
00061 {
00062   // Check for valid input.
00063   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00064     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00065 
00066   // Enable the appropriate interrupts.
00067   tc->channel[channel].ier = bitfield->etrgs << AVR32_TC_ETRGS_OFFSET |
00068                              bitfield->ldrbs << AVR32_TC_LDRBS_OFFSET |
00069                              bitfield->ldras << AVR32_TC_LDRAS_OFFSET |
00070                              bitfield->cpcs << AVR32_TC_CPCS_OFFSET |
00071                              bitfield->cpbs << AVR32_TC_CPBS_OFFSET |
00072                              bitfield->cpas << AVR32_TC_CPAS_OFFSET |
00073                              bitfield->lovrs << AVR32_TC_LOVRS_OFFSET |
00074                              bitfield->covfs << AVR32_TC_COVFS_OFFSET;
00075 
00076   // Disable the appropriate interrupts.
00077   tc->channel[channel].idr = (~bitfield->etrgs & 1) << AVR32_TC_ETRGS_OFFSET |
00078                              (~bitfield->ldrbs & 1) << AVR32_TC_LDRBS_OFFSET |
00079                              (~bitfield->ldras & 1) << AVR32_TC_LDRAS_OFFSET |
00080                              (~bitfield->cpcs & 1) << AVR32_TC_CPCS_OFFSET |
00081                              (~bitfield->cpbs & 1) << AVR32_TC_CPBS_OFFSET |
00082                              (~bitfield->cpas & 1) << AVR32_TC_CPAS_OFFSET |
00083                              (~bitfield->lovrs & 1) << AVR32_TC_LOVRS_OFFSET |
00084                              (~bitfield->covfs & 1) << AVR32_TC_COVFS_OFFSET;
00085 
00086   return 0;
00087 }
00088 
00089 
00090 int tc_select_external_clock(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel, unsigned int ext_clk_sig_src)
00091 {
00092   // Check for valid input.
00093   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS || ext_clk_sig_src >= 1 << AVR32_TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_SIZE)
00094     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00095 
00096   // Clear bit-field and set the correct behavior.
00097   tc->bmr = (tc->bmr & ~(AVR32_TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_MASK << (channel * AVR32_TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_SIZE))) |
00098             (ext_clk_sig_src << (channel * AVR32_TC_BMR_TC0XC0S_SIZE));
00099 
00100   return 0;
00101 }
00102 
00103 
00104 int tc_init_capture(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, const tc_capture_opt_t *opt)
00105 {
00106   // Check for valid input.
00107   if (opt->channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00108     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00109 
00110   // MEASURE SIGNALS: Capture operating mode.
00111   tc->channel[opt->channel].cmr = opt->ldrb << AVR32_TC_LDRB_OFFSET |
00112                                   opt->ldra << AVR32_TC_LDRA_OFFSET |
00113                                   0 << AVR32_TC_WAVE_OFFSET |
00114                                   opt->cpctrg << AVR32_TC_CPCTRG_OFFSET |
00115                                   opt->abetrg << AVR32_TC_ABETRG_OFFSET |
00116                                   opt->etrgedg << AVR32_TC_ETRGEDG_OFFSET|
00117                                   opt->ldbdis << AVR32_TC_LDBDIS_OFFSET |
00118                                   opt->ldbstop << AVR32_TC_LDBSTOP_OFFSET |
00119                                   opt->burst << AVR32_TC_BURST_OFFSET |
00120                                   opt->clki << AVR32_TC_CLKI_OFFSET |
00121                                   opt->tcclks << AVR32_TC_TCCLKS_OFFSET;
00122 
00123   return 0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 
00127 int tc_init_waveform(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, const tc_waveform_opt_t *opt)
00128 {
00129   // Check for valid input.
00130   if (opt->channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00131     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00132 
00133   // GENERATE SIGNALS: Waveform operating mode.
00134   tc->channel[opt->channel].cmr = opt->bswtrg << AVR32_TC_BSWTRG_OFFSET |
00135                                   opt->beevt << AVR32_TC_BEEVT_OFFSET |
00136                                   opt->bcpc << AVR32_TC_BCPC_OFFSET |
00137                                   opt->bcpb << AVR32_TC_BCPB_OFFSET |
00138                                   opt->aswtrg << AVR32_TC_ASWTRG_OFFSET |
00139                                   opt->aeevt << AVR32_TC_AEEVT_OFFSET |
00140                                   opt->acpc << AVR32_TC_ACPC_OFFSET |
00141                                   opt->acpa << AVR32_TC_ACPA_OFFSET |
00142                                   1 << AVR32_TC_WAVE_OFFSET |
00143                                   opt->wavsel << AVR32_TC_WAVSEL_OFFSET |
00144                                   opt->enetrg << AVR32_TC_ENETRG_OFFSET |
00145                                   opt->eevt << AVR32_TC_EEVT_OFFSET |
00146                                   opt->eevtedg << AVR32_TC_EEVTEDG_OFFSET |
00147                                   opt->cpcdis << AVR32_TC_CPCDIS_OFFSET |
00148                                   opt->cpcstop << AVR32_TC_CPCSTOP_OFFSET |
00149                                   opt->burst << AVR32_TC_BURST_OFFSET |
00150                                   opt->clki << AVR32_TC_CLKI_OFFSET |
00151                                   opt->tcclks << AVR32_TC_TCCLKS_OFFSET;
00152 
00153   return 0;
00154 }
00155 
00156 
00157 int tc_start(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00158 {
00159   // Check for valid input.
00160   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00161     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00162 
00163   // Enable, reset and start the selected timer/counter channel.
00164   tc->channel[channel].ccr = AVR32_TC_SWTRG_MASK | AVR32_TC_CLKEN_MASK;
00165 
00166   return 0;
00167 }
00168 
00169 
00170 int tc_stop(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00171 {
00172   // Check for valid input.
00173   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00174     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00175 
00176   // Disable the selected timer/counter channel.
00177   tc->channel[channel].ccr = AVR32_TC_CLKDIS_MASK;
00178 
00179   return 0;
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 int tc_software_trigger(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00184 {
00185   // Check for valid input.
00186   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00187     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00188 
00189   // Reset the selected timer/counter channel.
00190   tc->channel[channel].ccr = AVR32_TC_SWTRG_MASK;
00191 
00192   return 0;
00193 }
00194 
00195 
00196 void tc_sync_trigger(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc)
00197 {
00198   // Reset all channels of the selected timer/counter.
00199   tc->bcr = AVR32_TC_BCR_SYNC_MASK;
00200 }

00203 int tc_read_sr(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00204 {
00205   // Check for valid input.
00206   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00207     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00208

00210 }

00213 int tc_read_tc(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00214 {
00215   // Check for valid input.
00216   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00217     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00218 
00219   return Rd_bitfield(tc->channel[channel].cv, AVR32_TC_CV_MASK);
00220 }

00224 {

00226   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)

00243 int tc_read_rc(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel)
00244 {
00245   // Check for valid input.
00246   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)

00252 
00253 int tc_write_ra(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel, unsigned short value)
00254 {
00255   // Check for valid input.
00256   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00257     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00258 
00259   // This function is only available in WAVEFORM mode.
00260   if (Tst_bits(tc->channel[channel].cmr, AVR32_TC_WAVE_MASK))
00261     Wr_bitfield(tc->channel[channel].ra, AVR32_TC_RA_MASK, value);
00262 
00263   return value;
00264 }
00265 
00266 
00267 int tc_write_rb(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel, unsigned short value)
00268 {
00269   // Check for valid input.
00270   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00271     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00272 
00273   // This function is only available in WAVEFORM mode.
00274   if (Tst_bits(tc->channel[channel].cmr, AVR32_TC_WAVE_MASK))
00275     Wr_bitfield(tc->channel[channel].rb, AVR32_TC_RB_MASK, value);
00276 
00277   return value;
00278 }

00281 int tc_write_rc(volatile avr32_tc_t *tc, unsigned int channel, unsigned short value)
00282 {
00283   // Check for valid input.
00284   if (channel >= TC_NUMBER_OF_CHANNELS)
00285     return TC_INVALID_ARGUMENT;
00286 
00287   // This function is only available in WAVEFORM mode.
00288   if (Tst_bits(tc->channel[channel].cmr, AVR32_TC_WAVE_MASK))
00289     Wr_bitfield(tc->channel[channel].rc, AVR32_TC_RC_MASK, value);
00290 
00291   return value;
00292 }
